author: MSTYSLAV CHERNOV and YURAS KARMANAU
title: Russia strikes near Ukraine's capital; mosque reported hit
description: MARIUPOL, Ukraine (AP) — Russian forces pounding the port city of Mariupol shelled a mosque sheltering more than 80 people, including children, the Ukrainian government said Saturday. Fighting also raged on the outskirts of Ukraine's capital, Kyiv, as Russia'…
